txt.en: Find the source of the voices in Falch Gurth
A stone can be found in Falch Gurth.\n\nMithrandir has asked you to cast a stone into the shadows of Falch Gurth. You should pick up a nearby stone and cast it into the darkness.
It seems the Rangers have made camp in a small cleft within Falch Gurth
Mithrandir can be found within Falch Gurth.\n\nAfter casting a stone into the shadows of Thuringwath, it appears to be gone from the world. You should talk to Mithrandir.

'Hmmph.'

Mithrandir turns to face you.

'It is no mistake that our paths have crossed again, my friend.'
Cast a stone into the shadows of Falch Gurth

'It is most curious, is it not?'

Mithrandir does not turn to face you, and his eyes remain transfixed on the 'wall of shadow' Taurdir described.

'As I expected, the enwreathment spells the Nazg√ªl used to conceal the pass have faded. But, I did not expect to encounter this sort of sorcery.

'May I ask something of you, [placeholder]? It might seem a trifle, but take a stone and cast it into the shadows.'
A small company of Rangers of Ithilien passed through what Taurdir described as a 'wall of shadow' in Falch Gurth.
The stone disappears into the shadows, making no sound as it clatters unseen upon the ground
Find the 'wall of shadow' in Falch Gurth
To your surprise, Mithrandir stands before the 'wall of shadow'

'We didn't make it far the first night.

'A dark cloud, like some unearthly wall of shadow, appeared in our path. Only Nidhlas was brave enough to reach out into the darkness, but he withdrew his hand almost at once. It was as if a deathly chill had taken hold of his arm!

'I thought that was going to be the end of it, but Nidhlas insisted that we make camp... and so we did. The rain fell cold, and we had too few tents. Many of us took ill in the night, but Nidhlas led the rest beyond the shadows at first light.

'See for yourself, [placeholder]. It is some old devilry, I think!'
Mithrandir can be found in Falch Gurth.\n\nYou have discovered the 'wall of shadow' of which Taurdir spoke, but it appears Mithrandir followed in your wake. You should talk to him.
Shadows loom ahead of you, but you hear hushed voices up the path to the east
Search for the company of Rangers in Falch Gurth

The 'wall of shadow' can be found to the south of Torgris in Falch Gurth.\n\nCuilion has asked you to enter Falch Gurth and learn what has become of the company of Rangers who sought to explore Thuringwath.
